name: Shut Up, Evil Dragon! I Dont Want to Raise a Child With You Anymore
author: Milkshake tail sauce
content: After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer&#039s mission. But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...
